specialRules.hint: For each unmodified roll of 6 to hit when attacking in melee this model may roll 1 extra attack. This rule doesn’t apply to newly generated attacks.

specialRules.description: For each unmodified roll of 6 to hit when attacking in melee this model may roll 1 extra attack. This rule doesn’t apply to newly generated attacks.

specialRules.hint: Whenever this model moves over enemies pick one of them and roll 1 die, on a 2+ it takes 3 hits with AP(1).

spells.name: Scrutiny
spells.effect: Target enemy unit within 12” gets -1 to melee rolls next time it fights.

spells.name: Serpent Egg
spells.effect: Target enemy unit within 12” takes 4 automatic hits.

spells.name: Transcend
spells.effect: Target friendly unit within 12” may heal 1 wound or restore 1 model (with only 1 health left if it had Tough).

spells.name: Jaguar Pounce
spells.effect: Target enemy model within 12” takes 1 automatic hit with AP(3).

spells.name: Energy Reservoir
spells.effect: Target friendly unit within 12” gets +9” next time it moves.

spells.name: Piranha Swarm
spells.effect: Target 2 enemy units within 6” take 6 hits with AP(1) each.
